## Salary Data

The Fort Collins paste(i, sep = "") reports 
`r police %>% summarize(count = n())`
employees on staff in 2015. Of those employees the highest paid position is the
`r police %>% arrange(desc(earnings)) %>% filter(earnings == max(earnings)) %>% select(jobTitle)` with
an annual salary of 
`r paste("$", police %>% filter(earnings == max(earnings)) %>% select(earnings), sep = "")`.
